title: Check Real Number
description:
CHK_REAL reviewes X for valid values.
The return values are:
#00 valid foating-point
#20 + Infnity
#40 - Infnity
#80 NAN
For more information see the IEEE754 foating point specifcation.
name: CHK_REAL

input.name: X
input.description: The real number to be checked.

return_value.description: Returns a byte indicating the status of the real number according to IEEE754 standards.
